SEARCH

Class TextEditorGUI

java.lang.Object
TextEditorGUI
public class TextEditorGUI extends Object
A Graphical User Interface (GUI) for a text editor application. It provides functionalities for opening, editing, spell checking, and saving text files. Additional features include statistics about the text and highlighting of misspellings, capitalization errors, and double words.
Since:
2023-11-12
Version:
1.14
Author:
Yi Ran, Zirui Si, Jingwen Liu, Zhixuan Chen, Yuyang Zhou

    • isWordIgnored

      private boolean isWordIgnored(String word, int startOffset)
      Checks if a given word at a specific position is in the list of ignored words.
      Parameters:
      word - The word to check.
      startOffset - The starting offset of the word in the document.
      Returns:
      boolean True if the word is ignored, false otherwise.

      Calculates statistics like the number of characters, lines, and words in the text pane.
